mapper.select: select ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASS, CREATE_TIME, PHONE_NUMBER, STATU, FLAG, LAST_LOGTIME from APP_USER where ID = #{id}
select ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASS, STATU, FLAG from APP_USER where USER_ID = #{userId} and FLAG = #{flag}
select ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASS, STATU, FLAG from APP_USER where USER_ID = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into APP_USER (ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASS,CREATE_TIME,PHONE_NUMBER, STATU, FLAG) values (#{id},#{userid},#{nickname},#{pass},sysdate,#{phone},#{statu},#{flag})
mapper.update: update APP_USER set USER_PASS = #{pass} where ID = #{id}
update APP_USER set LAST_LOGTIME = sysdate where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASS, to_char(CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATE_TIME, PHONE_NUMBER, STATU, FLAG, to_char(LAST_LOGTIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') LAST_LOGTIME from APP_USER t1 order by LAST_LOGTIME desc
